DOC.detailed_description: Women include study accord susceptibility develop insulin resistance ( evaluate start body index mass IMC superior 28 kg.m-² , waist measurement 88 cm ) . Once include study , volunteer receive 4 week butter , dairy product biscuit enrich stearic , elaidic vaccenic acid . The volunteer undergo measurement body composition biphotonic absorptiometry well complete metabolic assessment ( blood urinary sample , clamp insulin biopsy ) .
DOC.criteria: female waist measurement > 88 cm body mass index > 28kg/m2 Affiliated National Health Insurance Subject give his/her write informed consent Subject willing comply study procedure Subject consider normal clinical examination medical questionnaire Reported food allergy Currently participate participate another clinical trial last 4 week prior begin study Hepatic renal impairment Positive serology HIV HCV , determine blood sample pregnant presently attempt get pregnant menopause lactate Blood donation do less 2 month start study Chronic pathology : diabetes , hypertriglyceridemia , hypertension , cardiovascular disease , chronic inflammatory disease Intestine , cardiovascular , kidney cancer pathology last 5 year Previous heavy intestine surgery ( except appendicectomy ) Previous medical and/or surgery judge investigator incompatible study High variation ( > 5 % ) body weight last 3 month Consuming nutritional supplement could interfere lipid metabolism ( fish oil capsule , vitamin , soja lecithin , … ) Heavy consumer alcohol Smoker exsmoker stop smoke less 1 month V0 ( 5 cigarettes/dy ) . Practising intensive physical exercise ( > 5 h per week ) Vegetarian vegan Being someone 's supervision Refusal register National Volunteers Data file Disliking butter , margarine , cheese , biscuits and/or vegetable oil Dietary habit unreliable control food intake Being exclusion National Volunteers Data file
